question: Lakshman sena’s court was adorned by:
explanation: Lakshman sena’s court was adorned by Jayadeva (the famous poet of Bengal), Dhoyi and Umapati Dhar. Even his Prime  Minister, Halayudha, was himself a great poet. The king himself was a man of letters ad completed the work \'Adbhut Sagar\'  begun by his father Ballal Sena.
